title: Update Rental Pricing Based on Market
description: A property manager needs to determine the new asking rent for a unit that will soon be vacant.

tasks.description: Identify the unit's details (beds, baths, sqft, amenities).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the key features of the unit.

tasks.description: Run a rental market analysis to find what similar units in the area are currently renting for.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds at least 5 comparable rental listings.

tasks.description: Set the new asking rent for the unit based on the market analysis and notify the property owner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the asking rent in the system and communicates the data-backed price to the owner.
